extraOptions.highlights: Copper Moon is more than just a restaurant; it’s a destination for those who appreciate the art of good food and great company.

packages.title: Hi-Tea
packages.menuDetail:
Terms and Conditions:

  • Additional Paneer or Chicken Starters will be charged INR 75 extra
  • Any Fish dishes will be charged INR 100 extra person.
  • Any mutton dishes will be charged INR 100 extra per person.
  • Please revert with your choice of menu at least 2 days before the event.
  • Seasonal dishes depend upon the availability
  • Duration of slot will be 3 hours.
  • No take away applicable from Buffet
  • Any Package not less than M.G of 10 pax, MG will be charged.
  • Any drinks and starters service will be for 2 hours in package.

nodes.title: Arms and ammunition are not allowed inside the premises.
Do not sit at tables that are already reserved.
Outside food and beverages are not allowed.
Parking is available. Guests are requested to park only in authorized and dedicated parking areas of the venue.
Pets are not allowed on the premises.

data.title: Copper Moon
data.content:
Welcome to Copper Moon, a culinary gem located in the vibrant neighborhood of Indirapuram, Ghaziabad. Our restaurant is a celebration of diverse flavors and culinary traditions, offering a tantalizing array of North Indian, Italian, Asian, Fast Food, American, and Continental cuisines.

At Copper Moon, we believe that great food has the power to bring people together and create unforgettable experiences. Our menu is thoughtfully curated to cater to a variety of tastes and preferences, ensuring that every guest finds something to delight in. Whether you’re craving the robust spices of North Indian dishes, the comforting flavors of Italian pasta, the exotic tastes of Asian cuisine, the convenience of fast food, the hearty appeal of American classics, or the sophistication of Continental fare, Copper Moon has it all.

The ambiance at Copper Moon is designed to provide a warm and welcoming environment where guests can relax and enjoy their meal. Our stylish and contemporary decor, coupled with attentive service, sets the perfect stage for any occasion—be it a family gathering, a romantic dinner, a casual lunch with friends, or a business meeting.
